title: Agent Enhancement and Learning
description: I want agents to adjust their task execution behavior based on success rates, so that the system continuously improves and learns from previous task outcomes.

title: Project Setup
description: I want to specify the project type (e.g., web app, API, etc.) so that the system can dynamically create a suitable architecture.

title: Task Prioritization
description: I want a priority queue system that allows tasks to be dynamically reordered based on dependencies and urgency, so that high-priority tasks are handled first.

title: System Health and Monitoring
description: I want the system to track and display the health of agents, including the number of tasks handled and success rates, so that I can monitor agent performance.

title: Dynamic Thread Management
description: I want the system to manage dynamic thread pools based on workload, so that tasks are efficiently processed across multiple agents.

title: Testing Automation
description: I want the system to automatically generate and execute tests for the project based on its architecture, so that I can ensure the quality of the codebase.

title: Failure Handling and Retry Logic
description: I want the system to implement exponential backoff and retry logic for tasks that fail, so that transient issues can be automatically resolved without manual intervention.

title: Security Audit
description: I want the system to perform security audits to detect and mitigate common vulnerabilities, so that I can ensure my project is secure.

title: Task Metadata Storage
description: I want to store task metadata, including execution time, success rates, and task complexity, so that I can track task performance metrics.

title: Agent Collaboration and Feedback Loop
description: I want agents to collaborate by providing feedback loops between each other when performing complex tasks, so that multi-agent tasks are coordinated efficiently.

title: Documentation Generation
description: I want the system to generate detailed documentation, including API docs and workflow diagrams, so that I can maintain clear and up-to-date project documentation.

title: User Feedback Integration
description: I want to provide feedback to improve system-generated features, such as project structures or code, so that the system becomes more personalized to my preferences.

title: Advanced Deployment Automation
description: I want automated deployment scripts that include Docker configurations, so that I can deploy my project seamlessly to various environments.

title: Version Control Integration
description: I want the system to automatically initialize and manage version control with Git, so that I can keep track of project changes without manual setup.

title: Frontend and Backend Integration
description: I want the system to automatically generate the frontend structure, including sample HTML and CSS files, so that I can quickly get started with user interface development.

title: Error Handling and Logging
description: I want comprehensive logging and error-handling mechanisms to be in place, so that I can troubleshoot issues effectively during development.
